title: Miss Monochrome: The Animation 2nd Season
alternative_title: ミス・モノクローム -The Animation- 2
description: The Ultra Super Pictures Special Stage event announced at AnimeJapan 2015 on Saturday that the Miss Monochrome television anime series will receive a second season. The season will run within the 30-minute Ultra Super Anime Time block beginning on July 3, 2015.
